source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000010_TATARU<tab>It's so much quieter these days without everyone around...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000010_TATARU<tab>「暁」が解散してからというもの、
ここも、少し静かになりまっした……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000020_TATARU<tab>...Not that I'm pining for your return, you understand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000020_TATARU<tab>でもでも、寂しくなんかないのです……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000030_TATARU<tab>I have my sources, and I know that each and every one of you is doing well and keeping busy with your endeavors!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000030_TATARU<tab>このタタルの情報網によれば、皆さん、それぞれの目的のために、
忙しくしながらも、元気に過ごされているようでっすから！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000040_TATARU<tab>Meanwhile, I'm left with a surplus of free time─and the question of how to make the most of it!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000040_TATARU<tab>かく言う私も、
多少は時間に融通が利くようになりまっしたので、
あれをやろう、これをやろう……といろいろ考え中なのでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000050_TATARU<tab>What about you? Any plans for the immediate future?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000050_TATARU<tab>冒険者さんは、これからどうされるのでっすか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>A grand new adventure, of course!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>新しい冒険がしたい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm still mulling it over...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>やるべきことを探している

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000060_TATARU<tab>Traveling to the edge of existence and back wasn't enough!? Well, if that's the case, I might have a suggestion for you...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000060_TATARU<tab>フフフ、天の果てまで行ってきたというのに、
冒険者さんは相変わらずでっすね！
それなら、私に良い考えが……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000070_TATARU<tab>I hope you weren't thinking of asking <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> for advice! Though, if you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> open to suggestions, I might have one for you...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000070_TATARU<tab>次の目的が決まっていないのでっすか？
それなら、私に良い考えが……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000080_TATARU<tab>After what you went through, I'm not surprised you need a moment to think. But if you're open to suggestions, I might have one for you...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000080_TATARU<tab>あれほどの大冒険をしたあとでっすからね。
何をするべきか迷っていらっしゃるようでっしたら、
私に良い考えが……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000090_TATARU<tab>You've fought bravely and selflessly, helping those in need and saving our star from unimaginable threats.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000090_TATARU<tab>これまで冒険者さんは、
困っている方々を助けたり、世界の脅威に抗ったりするために、
戦い続けてきまっした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000100_TATARU<tab>For your deeds, you've been hailed as the champion of Eorzea and a host of other incredible things. But why not put those titles aside for a while?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000100_TATARU<tab>そうして「英雄」と呼ばれるまでになりまっしたが……
終末を払ったいま、その肩書はいったん置いてしまっても、
良いと思うのでっす。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000110_TATARU<tab>Acquit yourself as a simple adventurer again, and travel the world in search of wonder!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000110_TATARU<tab>そして、初めて「砂の家」でお会いした日のように……
ひとりの冒険者に戻って、世界を巡ってみてはいかがでっすか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're right! Who knows what mysteries are still waiting to be discovered?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>新たな謎に出会えるかもしれない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>That's a great idea. But where to start...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>目的地はどうしよう……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000120_TATARU<tab>That's the spirit! I can feel from here the blazing fire that just lit in your belly!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000120_TATARU<tab>おおぅ！
早くも冒険者の顔つきになってきまっしたね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000130_TATARU<tab>Now all you need is a destination.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000130_TATARU<tab>でもでも、目的地は決まっているのでっすか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000135_TATARU<tab>If you're having trouble deciding, just leave it to me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000135_TATARU<tab>目的地が決まっていないのでっしたら、
このタタル・タルにお任せくだっさい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000140_TATARU<tab>Ahhh, with so many exciting places to choose from, it's hard to narrow it down...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000140_TATARU<tab>この世界の広さを考えれば、
無理からぬことなのでっす……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000150_TATARU<tab>But I believe I have the perfect destination in mind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000150_TATARU<tab>でもでも、ご安心を！
このタタルに良案があるのでっす……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000160_TATARU<tab>If you're having trouble deciding, just leave it to me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000160_TATARU<tab>目的地が決まっていないのでっしたら、
このタタル・タルにお任せくだっさい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000170_TATARU<tab>Thavnair─that's where you should go next!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000170_TATARU<tab>その目的地とは……ずばり、サベネア島！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000180_TATARU<tab>I doubt you were able to squeeze in a proper tour of Radz-at-Han the last time you were there, what with the burning skies and rampaging monsters and so forth. And I'm sure Vrtra would be pleased to see you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000180_TATARU<tab>前回は、終末の騒動もあって、
ラザハンの都も、ゆっくり観光できていないはずでっす。
ヴリトラさんのためにも、ぜひ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000190_TATARU<tab>Then there's the Bounty itself. The Empire's presence in the region was always a deterrent to exploration, so if you've a mind to sail that sea, now's your chance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000190_TATARU<tab>それに、サベネア島が浮かぶ豊穣海は、
最近まで帝国の影響力が強く、
冒険の手も及んでいなかったんだとか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000200_TATARU<tab>Just think of all the new experiences you could have!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000200_TATARU<tab>きっと、今も多くの謎や神秘が眠っているはずでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000210_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)Tell me, have you been to the ruins beneath the waters of the Bounty?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000210_EMETSELCH<tab>(-エメトセルク-)……お前、豊穣海に沈む海底遺跡に行ったことがあるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000220_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)As the bearer of Azem's crystal, you may consider your duty to see at least that much.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000220_EMETSELCH<tab>(-エメトセルク-)……アゼムのクリスタルを持つ者だろう？
それくらいは当然見ておけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000230_TATARU<tab>Oh, I know that look! That's an adventurer ready to take on the world!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000230_TATARU<tab>どうやら目的地が決まったようでっすね！
新たな冒険を前に、ワクワクが止まらないといった顔でっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000240_TATARU<tab>In anticipation of an occasion like this, I was planning to gift you a new set of traveling clothes, but it's, uh, still a work in progress.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000240_TATARU<tab>そんな冒険者さんの門出を祝して、
私から新たな旅装をプレゼントしたいのでっすが……
実はまだ作りかけでっして。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000250_TATARU<tab>Shouldn't take much longer now, though, so sit tight, and I'll have the last few bits sewn up before you can finish another cup of tea!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000250_TATARU<tab>大急ぎで完成させまっすので、
もう少し、このままお待ちいただけまっすか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q99_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q99_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A99_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're the best, Tataru.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A99_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>いつもありがとう、タタル

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A99_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Make sure it has pockets!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A99_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>冒険者らしいものを期待してる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000260_TATARU<tab>Stitching here and trimming there, knot the threads with love and care...♪
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000260_TATARU<tab>あれがこれでこうなって……
それがどれでああなって……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000270_TATARU<tab>Just a little more to go! I'm sure you're still brimming with excitement!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000270_TATARU<tab>すぐに完成させるので、
少～しだけ待っていてほしいのでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000280_TATARU<tab>Hee hee! I am one with the needle! See how the fabric surrenders to my whims!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000280_TATARU<tab>フフ、フフフフフ！
ノってきたでっす～！
この調子でバリバリ縫っていくのでっす～！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000290_TATARU<tab>Don't worry, I'll make sure the lining has plenty of pockets for all your little “treasures.” I swear, adventurers are worse than children when it comes to hoarding every feather and leaf and animal hide they come across...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000290_TATARU<tab>見えない部分にも、ポッケをたくさん用意しておくのでっす……。
冒険者さんは使いもしないのに、
毛皮や羽根や葉っぱなんかを拾ってくる人でっすから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000300_TATARU<tab>Oh, we mustn't forget the waterproofing. Gods forbid you forget to disrobe before plunging into the sea. Or a river. Or a piping hot bath...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000300_TATARU<tab>それから撥水性も大事でっす……。
海だろうと川だろうと温泉だろうと、
お構いなしに服のまま入ってしまう人でっすからね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And thus I am returned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>私は  戻ってきたのか――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000320_TATARU<tab>Ah, you're awake...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000320_TATARU<tab>目が覚めまっしたか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000330_TATARU<tab>My apologies, I do get a little carried away with my sewing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000330_TATARU<tab>お待たせしてごめんなさいでっす！
つい、針がノってしまい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000340_TATARU<tab>You seem awfully cheerful. Pleasant dream? Or are you just looking forward to the next chapter of your grand saga?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000340_TATARU<tab>なにか、いい夢でも見まっしたか……？
それとも、未知の冒険への興奮が漏れ出ているのでしょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000350_TATARU<tab>Either way, I promised to provide you with new apparel, and so I shall!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000350_TATARU<tab>そんな心躍ってらっしゃる冒険者さんに、
ぴったりの旅装が、もうすぐ完成しまっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000360_TATARU<tab>If you'll accompany me to the Diamond Forge, we can put the finishing touches on your outfit. Shall we?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000360_TATARU<tab>仕上げは工房で行うので、
「ダイヤモンドフォージ」までご足労いただけまっすか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000370_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Ragged Waif-)Please, Zasshal! Please! You must let me have that treasure map!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000370_MEHRAHD<tab>(-貧しい身なりの少年-)頼むよ、ザッシャルさん！
俺にもその宝の地図を譲ってくれよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000380_BAZAARMOBA<tab>What's all this about?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000380_BAZAARMOBA<tab>いったい何の騒ぎだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000390_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Ragged Waif-)My mother and father were slaughtered by monsters! My baby sister, still too young to fend for herself! Can you spare us no kindness!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000390_MEHRAHD<tab>(-貧しい身なりの少年-)父さんも母さんも、終末の獣に襲われて死んじまった！
それに、まだ妹も小さくて……だから！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000400_ZASSHAL<tab>So, you hope to find your fortune. And what? You expect me to surrender my wares for pity's sake?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000400_ZASSHAL<tab>だから、財宝を探したいって？
だがな小僧、地図を買うのにだって金は必要なんだぜ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000410_ZASSHAL<tab>What have you to offer in payment?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000410_ZASSHAL<tab>お前にそれだけの金が出せるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000420_ZASSHAL<tab>As I thought! Come back when you've more than rags to your name!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000420_ZASSHAL<tab>ハッ！
金がねえなら、指でも咥えて帰るこったな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000430_ZASSHAL<tab>This is no mere treasure map! It is a guide to the vaults of Alzadaal III─one of the great satraps of Radz-at-Han, and a direct descendant of Alzadaal Khan!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000430_ZASSHAL<tab>なにせこいつは、始まりの族長アルザダールの子孫であり、
ラザハン黎明期を支えた名太守、アルザダール3世が遺した、
宝物殿の在り処を示した地図なんだぞォ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000440_BAZAARMOBA<tab>A map to Alzadaal's Legacy...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000440_BAZAARMOBA<tab>アルザダールの宝物殿だって？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000450_BAZAARMOBB<tab>So he says...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000450_BAZAARMOBB<tab>本物なのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000460_BAZAARMOBC<tab>(-Bazaar Patron-)A fake, I'd wager!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000460_BAZAARMOBC<tab>(-バザールの通行人-)どうせ偽物だろ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000470_ZASSHAL<tab>This is no fake! The parchment is marked with an arcane glyph of passage!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000470_ZASSHAL<tab>おいおい、偽物と決めつけてくれるなよ！
この地図には、宝物殿を開く証文が書かれているんだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000480_ZASSHAL<tab>You may find the ruins hidden in the Bounty, but you won't be setting foot inside without this in your possession!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000480_ZASSHAL<tab>こいつがなけりゃ、遺跡にたどり着こうとも、
中に入ることすらできねえって寸法よ！
この証文こそ、宝の地図が本物だって証なのさ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000490_ZASSHAL<tab>A priceless artifact, it is! Discovered amongst the rubble in the aftermath of the Final Days, and lovingly restored by yours truly!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000490_ZASSHAL<tab>終末の騒動で壊れちまった遺跡を修復していた職人が、
ボロボロの地図を発見してな。
このザッシャルの完璧な修復で元どおりよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000500_ZASSHAL<tab>This map is the key to fabulous riches, and I would be the king of fools to simply <var 1A 02 /var>give<var 1A 01 /var> it away!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000500_ZASSHAL<tab>この地図がありゃ一攫千金も夢じゃねえ！
だが、少しの金も払えねえ奴に、夢を掴む資格なし！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000510_ZASSHAL<tab>Be glad I am no such king, boy─your scrawny hide would never return with that treasure alive!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000510_ZASSHAL<tab>ま、どの道お前のようなガキじゃ、
宝にたどり着く前に死ぬのがオチだがな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000520_ZASSHAL<tab>Gahahaha!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000520_ZASSHAL<tab>ハッハッハ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000530_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Ragged Waif-)O cruel fate! Why must you tempt me with wealth I am powerless to claim!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000530_MEHRAHD<tab>(-貧しい身なりの少年-)く、くそーッ！
目の前に一攫千金のチャンスがあるってのに！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000540_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Ragged Waif-)How I shall envy the one who purchases that precious map! Whatever they pay will be but a pittance against the golden hoard they stand to uncover!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000540_MEHRAHD<tab>(-貧しい身なりの少年-)この地図を手にできる奴が羨ましいぜ！
払った金の数倍……いや、それ以上のお宝が、
手に入るんだからなあ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000550_ZASSHAL<tab>What of you, sir? A fighting man of your stature would surely relish the challenge of recovering Alzadaal's lost fortune!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000550_ZASSHAL<tab>どうだい、ダンナ？
アルザダール3世が遺したお宝に興味はないかい？
ダンナのような類い希なる武人にこそ、この地図は相応しい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000560_ESTINIEN<tab>A fortune, you say...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000560_ESTINIEN<tab>宝の地図、か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000570_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Ragged Waif-)If I had but the strength to seize that treasure, my starving sister would never want for food!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000570_MEHRAHD<tab>(-貧しい身なりの少年-)俺にも力があれば、
宝を手に入れて妹を食わせてやれるのに……！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000580_ESTINIEN<tab>I'll take it. Will this cover the price?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000580_ESTINIEN<tab>なら、もらおうか。
これで足りるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000590_ESTINIEN<tab>Well met, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000590_ESTINIEN<tab>よう、相棒……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000600_ESTINIEN<tab>Someone is dressed for adventure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000600_ESTINIEN<tab>いよいよ冒険者稼業の再開……といったところか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000610_ESTINIEN<tab>But why Thavnair of all places? Knowing you, I suspect there is more to your plans than sightseeing and shopping.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000610_ESTINIEN<tab>だが、わざわざサベネア島を選んだのはどういうわけだ？
お前のことだから、
ただの観光や買い物ってわけじゃないんだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000620_ESTINIEN<tab>Ruins beneath the Bounty...? Curious. And here I've acquired a map to just such a site...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000620_ESTINIEN<tab>豊穣海に沈む海底遺跡、ね……。
……偶然にも俺の手には、
その遺跡の場所を示す宝の地図があるわけだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000630_ZASSHAL<tab>With that sale, I do believe I've earned the rest of the day off. Thank you for your patronage, sir, but if you'll excuse me...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000630_ZASSHAL<tab>さあて、目玉の商品も売れたことだし、
ここらで今日は、引き上げさせてもらうぜ。
じゃあな、ダンナ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000640_ESTINIEN<tab>You needn't mind us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000640_ESTINIEN<tab>ああ、邪魔したな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000650_ZASSHAL<tab>And now I've fleeced one of the heroes of the Final Days. I pray the Sisters were looking elsewhere...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000650_ZASSHAL<tab>それにしても、この国を終末から救ってくだすった、
英雄サマがたがお越しとは。
せいぜい罰が当たりませんように……と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000660_ESTINIEN<tab>This map may or may not be genuine. Either way, we'll need a ship to find out for sure.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000660_ESTINIEN<tab>さて、こいつが本物にせよ偽物にせよ、
確かめるには、船が要るようだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You seem eager to be underway.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ずいぶんやる気だな

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I never took you for a treasure hunter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>宝に興味があるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000670_ESTINIEN<tab>Lest you misunderstand, I seek the treasure not for myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000670_ESTINIEN<tab>別に、宝が目当てなわけじゃないさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000680_ESTINIEN<tab>If such a fortune truly exists, then it could help ease the struggles of those who lost their loved ones in the Final Days.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000680_ESTINIEN<tab>だが本当に宝があるなら、
終末で家族を失った、この国の連中にくれてやればいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000690_ESTINIEN<tab>I hope to do for Thavnair what you and Alphinaud did for the Ala Mhigans when you recovered the mad king's trove.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000690_ESTINIEN<tab>困窮したアラミゴ市民のため、
「廃王の黄金」とやらを持ち帰った、お前たちのようにな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000700_ESTINIEN<tab>Come now, you know Alphinaud needs little encouragement when it comes to recounting the tales of your shared exploits.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000700_ESTINIEN<tab>いつだったか、アルフィノの奴から聞いたのさ。
お前との冒険譚をな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000710_ESTINIEN<tab>Speaking of precocious lads, that boy in the bazaar was clearly an accomplice of the merchant.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000710_ESTINIEN<tab>それはそうと、
さっき商人に泣きついていたガキがいただろう。
おそらく、奴と商人はグルだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000720_ESTINIEN<tab>I suppose his role was to draw the attention of the crowd and add weight to the merchant's bold claims.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000720_ESTINIEN<tab>通行人の関心を惹いて、
さも価値がある地図だと思わせるため、
三文芝居を打っていたってとこだろうな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000730_ESTINIEN<tab>A transparent act for the most part, but 'twas not all mummery─the need to provide for his sister rang true enough.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000730_ESTINIEN<tab>だが、幼い妹を養わなきゃならんと言ったときの目は、
本音を映しているように見えた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000740_ESTINIEN<tab>Thus if some portion of the profits end up in that waif's pockets, then I will consider it money well spent...whether the map leads us to the vault or not.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000740_ESTINIEN<tab>売上のいくらが、あのガキの分け前になるのかは知らんが、
多少なりとも生活の助けにはなるだろうさ。
地図の真贋はともかく、な。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000750_ESTINIEN<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> coming along, yes?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000750_ESTINIEN<tab>で……
お前も行くんだろう、相棒。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Naturally!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>もちろん！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Shall we split the expenses?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>割り勘にしようか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000760_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmph, I thought as much.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000760_ESTINIEN<tab>冒険者相手に、聞くまでもなかったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000770_ESTINIEN<tab>I appreciate the concern, but if there is one thing I've learned from my time with the Scions, it is how to better manage my coinpurse.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000770_ESTINIEN<tab>俺の懐なら、心配しなくてもいい。
これでも多少は金勘定の方法を習ったからな……。
「暁」で学んだことのひとつ、というわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000780_ESTINIEN<tab>Now, let's see about securing a vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000780_ESTINIEN<tab>さて、まずは船の調達といこう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000790_GRAHATIA<tab>I've never known Y'shtola to doze off in the middle of research before...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000790_GRAHATIA<tab>ヤ・シュトラが調べ物の途中で居眠りなんて、
珍しいこともあるもんだな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000800_YSHTOLA<tab>Mmm... I close my eyes for one moment...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000800_YSHTOLA<tab>……私、いつの間に……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000810_YSHTOLA<tab>Ow!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000810_YSHTOLA<tab>うっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>How long have you two been here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>あなたたち……いつからそこに？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000830_YSHTOLA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000830_YSHTOLA<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>We just arrived!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>今来たばかりです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We didn't want to wake you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>起こしたら悪いと思って

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Catching up on some light reading?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>調べ物をしていたのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000840_YSHTOLA<tab>Did you now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000840_YSHTOLA<tab>……本当でしょうね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000850_YSHTOLA<tab>Nor did I want to fall asleep.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000850_YSHTOLA<tab>……不覚だわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000860_YSHTOLA<tab>...Something to that effect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000860_YSHTOLA<tab>……ええ、見てのとおりよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>I must have been studying for two...three days straight before exhaustion finally claimed me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>ふぅ……2日……いえ、3日かしら……
寝ていないのを忘れていたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>As you know, I've been researching ways to travel from the Source to one of its reflections.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>……ハイデリンによって、
14に分かたれた世界。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000890_YSHTOLA<tab>Well...looking for hints, at least. I don't expect to find a simple set of instructions tucked away in some dark corner of the library.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000890_YSHTOLA<tab>ここ、原初世界から鏡像世界へと渡る方法について、
少しでも手がかりがあるならと調べていたのだけれど、
そのものズバリなんて見つかるはずもなく……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000900_YSHTOLA<tab>So I've been skimming through the stacks, hoping to uncover even a partial mention of any similar feats in the past.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000900_YSHTOLA<tab>断片的でも、過去に近い事象が起こっていればと、
片っ端から書物を読み漁っていたのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000910_YSHTOLA<tab>A means to travel between worlds exists, and you can be sure I will find a way to employ it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000910_YSHTOLA<tab>「世界を飛び越える術ぐらい、見つけ出してみせる」……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000920_YSHTOLA<tab>So I promised Runar, but 'twould seem I've set myself a nigh-impossible task.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000920_YSHTOLA<tab>そう、あの子と約束はしたけれど、
簡単に成し遂げられることだとは思っていないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000930_GRAHATIA<tab>You needn't be so hard on yourself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000930_GRAHATIA<tab>まぁ、そう気を落とすなよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000940_GRAHATIA<tab>The leap I made with the Crystal Tower was not achieved in an afternoon─it was the culmination of a collective effort spanning generations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000940_GRAHATIA<tab>オレが使った、クリスタルタワーによる次元跳躍だって、
何世代にも亘る努力の末に成し遂げられたことなんだ。
一朝一夕にとはいかないさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh, you think me discouraged? I assure you, 'tis quite the opposite.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>あら、私が気落ちしているように見えて？
むしろその逆よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000960_YSHTOLA<tab>A daunting challenge and the time to sink my teeth into it? I feel like a fresh-faced student again.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000960_YSHTOLA<tab>ようやく腰を据えて、挑みがいのある課題と出会えたのだもの。
童心に帰ったかのような心持ちよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000970_GRAHATIA<tab>A scholar in her element.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000970_GRAHATIA<tab>ヤ・シュトラには、いらぬ心配だったか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000980_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. Was there something else you wished to ask of me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000980_YSHTOLA<tab>それで、あなたたちはどうしてここに？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000990_YSHTOLA<tab>Alzadaal is no minor figure in Hannish history, and much is known about his family.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000990_YSHTOLA<tab>アルザダールの名は、ラザハンで耳にしたことがあるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001000_YSHTOLA<tab>But this is the first I've heard of a descendant surviving a trip to another world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001000_YSHTOLA<tab>けれど、その子孫が、
異世界に赴いて生還したという話は初耳よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001010_YSHTOLA<tab>If those tales are true, then he may have left behind some clue as to how it was accomplished.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001010_YSHTOLA<tab>もしもそれが本当なら、次元跳躍について、
何らかの手がかりが得られるかもしれないわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>An invitation to delve into one of the world's lingering mysteries? As if I could refuse.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>……フフ、世界の謎に挑む冒険、というわけね。
あなたの誘いに、ありがたく乗らせていただくわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001030_YSHTOLA<tab>And whence do we embark upon this expedition?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001030_YSHTOLA<tab>それで……
その宝物殿とやらへ向かうには、どこへ行けばいいのかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001040_GRAHATIA<tab>Akyaali, by ship─but before that, we thought to extend an invitation to Urianger as well. He was in Thaumazein, last we heard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001040_GRAHATIA<tab>アキャーリから船で行くらしいが、
その前に、ウリエンジェにも声をかけよう。
たしか、ラヴィリンソスの「タウマゼイン」に来てるはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001050_YSHTOLA<tab>Then by all means, let us recruit him and be on our way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001050_YSHTOLA<tab>そうと決まれば、急ぎましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001060_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, Ojika, my good man.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001060_GRAHATIA<tab>ああ、オジカか？
ちょうどいいところに……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001070_GRAHATIA<tab>Would you be so...kind...as to...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001070_GRAHATIA<tab>悪いがちょっと頼まれてくれ……ない……か……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001080_KRILE<tab>Isn't this a pleasant surprise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001080_KRILE<tab>あら、いらっしゃい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001090_GRAHATIA<tab>I wish you had sent word ahead. I thought I was having visions for a moment there!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001090_GRAHATIA<tab>来るなら前もって教えてくれ……。
いきなりだから驚いたぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What are the two of you working on?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ふたりはここで何を？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>How is the restoration of the Students coming along?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>そっちの近況は？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001100_KRILE<tab>Raha and I have been compiling old records of the Students' activities.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001100_KRILE<tab>私とラハくんは、
バルデシオン委員会の再建に向けて、
過去の活動記録を編纂しなおしていたところよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001110_KRILE<tab>Slow and steady. Raha and I have been compiling old records of the Students' activities.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001110_KRILE<tab>まさに今、再建を目指しているところよ。
こうして私とラハくんで、
過去の活動記録を編纂しなおしていたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001120_KRILE<tab>We were able to locate several accounts in the archives of Noumenon, but the bulk of our documents was lost along with the Isle of Val...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001120_KRILE<tab>とはいえ、ヌーメノン大書院でわずかに記録が見つかった程度で、
ほとんどがバル島と一緒に消滅してしまったんだけどね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001130_KRILE<tab>We located several accounts in the archives of Noumenon, and added them to the collection we recovered from the Isle of Val.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001130_KRILE<tab>ヌーメノン大書院で見つけた記録と、
バル島から回収できた記録を統合しているのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001140_GRAHATIA<tab>And judging by the progress we've made thus far, sorting this pile will keep us occupied for days to come.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001140_GRAHATIA<tab>そんなわけで、まだ始まったばかり。
気長にやっていくしかなさそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001150_GRAHATIA<tab>But what brings you to the annex, my friend? Surely you haven't come all this way just to watch us shuffle dusty papers around?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001150_GRAHATIA<tab>……ところで、わざわざ立ち寄ってくれたんだ。
オレたちに用があるんじゃないのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001160_GRAHATIA<tab>The treasure vault of Alzadaal III...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001160_GRAHATIA<tab>ラザハンの名太守、アルザダール3世が遺した宝物殿か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001170_KRILE<tab>And you're looking for companions to join you on this expedition?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001170_KRILE<tab>あなたは、その海底遺跡探検に、
同行してくれる人を探しているのね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001180_KRILE<tab>I would dearly love to accompany you, of course, but I'm afraid I'm committed to another task. On the subject of which, I had hoped to ask for your assistance...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001180_KRILE<tab>一緒に行きたいのはやまやまなんだけど、
実は、別の依頼が入ってきているのよ。
そのことで、あなたに相談しようと思っていたのだけれど……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001190_KRILE<tab>TO BE DELETED
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001190_KRILE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001191_KRILE<tab>Then again, it's not so urgent that it can't wait until you've returned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001191_KRILE<tab>まぁ、火急の用というわけでもないみたいだから、
そちらの用事が済んだら、顔を見せてもらえると嬉しいわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001200_KRILE<tab>You should go, Raha. I'll stay here and mind the shop, as it were.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001200_KRILE<tab>だからラハくん……いいよ、行ってきて。
ここには、私が残っておくから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001210_GRAHATIA<tab>Are you sure? I'd hate to leave you shorthanded...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001210_GRAHATIA<tab>ほ、本当か！？
本当に良いのか……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001220_KRILE<tab>I'm sure. Just try to be back before <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> many moons have passed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001220_KRILE<tab>ええ、もちろん。
でも、例の件もあるから、あまり遅くならないようにね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001230_GRAHATIA<tab>Well! I guess we're off on another adventure already!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001230_GRAHATIA<tab>こんなに早く、またあんたと冒険に行けるなんてな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001240_GRAHATIA<tab>Have you asked anyone else to come along?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001240_GRAHATIA<tab>それで、ほかに誰か誘ってるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001250_GRAHATIA<tab>Then might I suggest we invite Y'shtola?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001250_GRAHATIA<tab>なら、ヤ・シュトラにも声をかけてみないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001260_GRAHATIA<tab>Ever since the Scions disbanded, she's spent most of her time cloistered within the Great Gubal Library, hoping to piece together a method to traverse the rift.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001260_GRAHATIA<tab>「暁の血盟」の解散後、
ヤ・シュトラは「世界を飛び越える術」を求めて、
グブラ幻想図書館に籠もりきりだったらしいが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001270_GRAHATIA<tab>It would seem, however, that whatever wisdom she sought there was not to be found. She arrived in Sharlayan the other day─we spoke briefly before she began her search of Noumenon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001270_GRAHATIA<tab>どうにも、お目当てのものが見つからなかったらしくてな。
数日前にここに立ち寄って、
これからヌーメノン大書院に向かうつもりだって、話してたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001280_GRAHATIA<tab>Considering what you've told us of Alzadaal's extraordinary feats, I do believe Y'shtola would be more than interested to hear what you have to say.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001280_GRAHATIA<tab>アルザダール3世が、異世界から生還したという噂が本当なら、
彼女の研究の手がかりが得られるかもしれない。
きっと興味を示してくれるはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001290_GRAHATIA<tab>Splendid. Then let us head to the archives at once.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001290_GRAHATIA<tab>よし、そうと決まれば、
さっそくヤ・シュトラのところへ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001300_KRILE<tab>Wait, before you go─I have another potential member to volunteer, if you've room to spare. Urianger.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001300_KRILE<tab>あ、待って。
丁度良い機会だから、ウリエンジェさんも誘ってあげて。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001310_KRILE<tab>He sent the Students a request for materials, you see─treatises on the architecture of treasure vaults and the like.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001310_KRILE<tab>ウリエンジェさんから、バルデシオン委員会宛てに、
宝物庫に関わる資料が欲しいと相談されたのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001320_KRILE<tab>From what I can gather, the Loporrits are looking to make “improvements” to their own creation, and wish to learn more about how we build things down here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001320_KRILE<tab>なんでもレポリットたちが、宝物庫の改築のために、
ヒトの文化を知りたがっているとか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001330_KRILE<tab>From what I can gather, the Loporrits wish to build their own vault for the people of Etheirys to explore, and are looking for inspiration to help make it a “memorable” experience.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001330_KRILE<tab>なんでもレポリットたちが、
ヒトを楽しませる宝物庫を創りたがっているんだとか……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001340_KRILE<tab>So why not take Urianger with you? Let him study Alzadaal's Legacy firsthand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001340_KRILE<tab>それならいっそ、ウリエンジェさん自身を、
取材がてら現地に連れていってあげたらどうかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001350_GRAHATIA<tab>None can deny the benefit of seeing something with your own eyes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001350_GRAHATIA<tab>そうだな、自分の目で見たもの以上に、
確かな情報源はないよな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001360_GRAHATIA<tab>If our expedition leader has no objections, I say we extend Urianger an invitation once we've spoken with Y'shtola.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001360_GRAHATIA<tab>ヤ・シュトラに声をかけたあとに、
ウリエンジェも誘いに行ってみるか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001370_KRILE<tab>Safe travels, you two. But don't forget: I'd still like your help with that other matter I mentioned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001370_KRILE<tab>ふたりとも、気をつけていってらっしゃい。
ただ、私からの相談の件も忘れないでね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001380_GRAHATIA<tab>Right! Then it's off to the library!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001380_GRAHATIA<tab>よし、そうと決まれば、
ヤ・シュトラを探しにヌーメノン大書院へ行こう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001390_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001390_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001400_URIANGER<tab>Ah, our illustrious champion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001400_URIANGER<tab>これはこれは……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001410_URIANGER<tab>Cloaked in the mantle of the common explorer, fame set aside in thy pursuit of simple adventure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001410_URIANGER<tab>かくて英雄は、その名を秘して新たなる冒険に向かう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001420_URIANGER<tab>I am told a new expedition is in the offing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001420_URIANGER<tab>あなたが活動を再開されたと、
おふたりから伺いました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>'Tis good to see you well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>元気そうで安心した

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wasn't Thancred with you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>サンクレッドはどうした？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001430_URIANGER<tab>And thee. As ever, thou art the picture of strength.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001430_URIANGER<tab>ありがとうございます。
あなたも、変わらず息災なようで、何よりです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001440_URIANGER<tab>He left to attend to some personal errand, but should be returning ere long.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001440_URIANGER<tab>彼は、所用でこの場を離れております。
すぐに戻られると思いますが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001450_YSHTOLA<tab>You've been keeping yourself busy, I trust?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001450_YSHTOLA<tab>「暁の血盟」が解散してからこれまで、
あなたは何をしていたの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001460_URIANGER<tab>True to our plan, Thancred and I embarked upon a pilgrimage of sorts, with an eye for gauging the state of those lands through which we passed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001460_URIANGER<tab>サンクレッドとふたり、
諸国の様子を見て回っておりました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001470_URIANGER<tab>Our travels were interrupted, however, by a request for aid from our befurred lunar allies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001470_URIANGER<tab>しかし先日レポリットたちから、
協力の要請が舞い降りまして。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001480_URIANGER<tab>As you may recall, the Loporrits had been seeking new purpose for the moon─another role through which it might serve to benefit mankind. The Forum hath been working to advise them in this endeavor, but I returned to offer mine own counsel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001480_URIANGER<tab>本来の役割を失った月を、いかに用いるべきか。
哲学者議会との間で検討を始めたようなのですが、
助言を請われ、戻ってきたのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001490_GRAHATIA<tab>And this has what to do with treasure vaults exactly...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001490_GRAHATIA<tab>それがどうして、宝物庫に繋がるんだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001500_URIANGER<tab>Ah, you have learned of my predicament from Mistress Krile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001500_URIANGER<tab>ああ、クルル嬢から聞いたのですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001510_URIANGER<tab>I know not whence they acquired such knowledge, but the Loporrits now stand convinced that adventurers delight in treasure hunts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001510_URIANGER<tab>どこで伝え聞いたのか、
冒険者たちは宝の地図を好むのだと知ったようでして。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001520_URIANGER<tab>Thus with their newly built “wonderland of riches and mystery” do they hope to entice all manner of daring delvers to the moon. So earnest and innocent was their desire to bring joy to the world that I found myself powerless to refuse them my cooperation...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001520_URIANGER<tab>月に宝物庫を築いて、冒険者を呼び込もうというのですよ。
ヒトを楽しませたいという純粋な想いゆえに、
協力の要請を、無下に断れずにいたところなのですが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001530_URIANGER<tab>But what of you, my friends? Why are you come to Labyrinthos?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001530_URIANGER<tab>皆さんは、なぜこちらに？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001540_URIANGER<tab>Fascinating. This is, indeed, a most fortuitous opportunity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001540_URIANGER<tab>なるほど。
たしかに、その申し出は好都合と言えましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001550_URIANGER<tab>I should be honored to accept thine invitation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001550_URIANGER<tab>さすれば、その調査、
ぜひとも、私もご同行させていただきたく。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001560_URIANGER<tab>How long hath it been, I wonder, when last our actions were not impelled by fate or desperation?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001560_URIANGER<tab>それにしても、何ら使命を帯びていない、
純粋な冒険というのはいつぶりでしょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001570_YSHTOLA<tab>Aye, though I cherish the Scions' accomplishments, 'tis pleasant to not have the weight of the world upon our shoulders for a change.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001570_YSHTOLA<tab>「暁」が解散したからこそ、
実現した旅、と言えるかもしれないわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001580_GRAHATIA<tab>Counting Estinien, we number five now, yes? Without knowing what traps or perils await unwary feet, we may be wise to refrain from recruiting others.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001580_GRAHATIA<tab>エスティニアンを入れたら、これで5人か。
宝物殿には、どんな罠が仕掛けられているかわからない。
これ以上の大所帯で向かうのは得策じゃないだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001590_YSHTOLA<tab>I agree. Between us, we should have the skills to handle whatever situation may arise. Shall we be on our way?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001590_YSHTOLA<tab>役割分担は問題なくやれそうだし……
このメンバーで向かうとしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001600_THANCRED<tab>What, no time to spare a word for the grizzled old bard?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001600_THANCRED<tab>(-？？？？-)おおっと……挨拶でもと思ったんだが、
もう行っちまうのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001610_URIANGER<tab>All is well, I trust?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001610_URIANGER<tab>サンクレッド。
用件は、もういいのですか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001620_THANCRED<tab>A wasted trip, I'm afraid. I'd hoped to catch up with a former mentor while you parleyed with the rabbits, but it seems our paths were not to cross.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001620_THANCRED<tab>ああ、お前さんがレポリットたちと話している間に、
昔世話になった恩師に会おうと思ったんだが……
結局、会えずじまいで戻ってきたのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're looking well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>元気そうで安心した

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>How was your “pilgrimage”?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ウリエンジェとの旅はどうだった？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001630_THANCRED<tab>That's because we didn't travel by experimental aetheryte. It's astounding what a lack of nausea does for one's sense of well-being.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001630_THANCRED<tab>今回は、新型エーテライトは使ってないからな。
エーテル酔いさえなければ、そうそう体調は崩さんさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001640_THANCRED<tab>Having an astrologian beside you on the road is surprisingly convenient. And it doesn't hurt that he's making strides with his light-hearted banter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001640_THANCRED<tab>星見に長けたヤツが一緒なのは、心強いものさ。
最近は、愛想の面でも改善が見られるし、な。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001650_THANCRED<tab>In any case, as we made our way around Ilsabard, we saw that much of the continent was in various stages of chaos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001650_THANCRED<tab>イルサバード大陸を駆け足に一回りしてきたが、
大小あれど、相変わらずどこでも混乱は起こっている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001660_THANCRED<tab>A certain amount of disorder is to be expected─the Final Days are over, and the people no longer have a common threat binding them together.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001660_THANCRED<tab>終末の災厄という共通の危機が、
人々を結束させていた側面もあったから、
それが去ってしまえば、多少はな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001670_THANCRED<tab>But that's the thing with these fledgling troubles, eh? You need to keep an eye out lest they mature into full-grown headaches.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001670_THANCRED<tab>今はせいぜい、その混乱の芽が大きくならないよう、
目を光らせておくとするさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001680_THANCRED<tab>So. For what reason have so many esteemed personages seen fit to gather?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001680_THANCRED<tab>それで、お前たちはここで何をしてるんだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001690_THANCRED<tab>Beneath the waters of the Bounty, you say? I see you've already stolen away my traveling partner with the promise of unexplored ruins and scholarly glory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001690_THANCRED<tab>豊穣海に沈む海底遺跡ね……。
それじゃ、敏腕占い師のウリエンジェ大先生は、
遺跡調査という、新たな仕事にありついたというわけか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001700_URIANGER<tab>Nay, 'tis not for mine own indulgence, but rather the fulfillment of my commitment to the Loporrits.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001700_URIANGER<tab>いえ、私は雇い主であるレポリットたちに代わり、
調査に赴く、いわば下請けのような立場です……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001710_THANCRED<tab>Ah, of course... And if you have Estinien rounding out your group, you likely have all the members you need.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001710_THANCRED<tab>エスティニアンもいるなら、人手は足りているんだろう。
俺の出る幕はなさそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001720_YSHTOLA<tab>Feeling left out? I could put in a good word for you, if you like.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001720_YSHTOLA<tab>寂しいというなら、あなたの同行を進言してあげてもよくてよ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001730_THANCRED<tab>We may have been “released” from our obligations, but I'll never be free of that merciless wit of yours, will I?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001730_THANCRED<tab>「暁」が解散しても、「魔女」の弁舌は衰え知らずか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001740_THANCRED<tab>In all seriousness, 'tis best I sit this one out. Too many former Scions consorting with one another might be seen as a cause for concern in certain quarters.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001740_THANCRED<tab>ま、元「暁」の俺たちがぞろぞろと動けば、
いらぬ不安を煽ることにもなりかねない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001750_THANCRED<tab>I'll return to my usual reconnaissance, and scout out the situation in the Far East. Feel free to share if you come across any interesting revelations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001750_THANCRED<tab>俺はいつもの単独行動で、
今度は東方まで足を伸ばしてくるとしよう。
また面白そうな話があったときにでも、声をかけてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001760_THANCRED<tab>Till we meet again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001760_THANCRED<tab>じゃ、またな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001770_URIANGER<tab>Shall we also hasten our departure? Ser Estinien will wonder what hath become of us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001770_URIANGER<tab>それでは、参りましょうか。
アキャーリで「エスティニアン」と合流するのでしたね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001780_GRAHATIA<tab>What have we here...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001780_GRAHATIA<tab>何だあれは……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001790_URIANGER<tab>'Tis not unlike a Hannish alchemical furnace in design...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001790_URIANGER<tab>ラザハン式の錬金窯のようにも見えますが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001800_YSHTOLA<tab>Well, there is one way we might find out...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001800_YSHTOLA<tab>調べてみないことには、何とも言えないわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001810_VARSHAHN<tab>Stop! You mustn't touch it!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001810_VARSHAHN<tab>(-？？？？-)待て！
その装置に触れてはならない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001820_GRAHATIA<tab>Vrtra... Ah, my apologies. Should I continue calling you “Varshahn”?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001820_GRAHATIA<tab>あんたはヴリトラ……
いや、その姿のときはヴァルシャンだったか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001830_VARSHAHN<tab>You may address me as you wish. My nature is no longer a secret.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001830_VARSHAHN<tab>ヴリトラと呼んでくれて構わない。
今さら隠す必要もないのでな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001840_VARSHAHN<tab>Still, this is not the setting I imagined for our reunion. Surely you've not entered these ruins as common looters...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001840_VARSHAHN<tab>それにしても、
このような場所で君たちと再会することになろうとは。
よもや盗掘が目的……ではないだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001850_ESTINIEN<tab>Would that we could deny your accusations...but I fear you're not far from the truth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001850_ESTINIEN<tab>人聞きの悪いことを……と言いたいところだが、
強く否定はできんな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001860_URIANGER<tab>Great Vrtra. Might we beseech thee to explain the nature of this strange contrivance?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001860_URIANGER<tab>……天竜ヴリトラよ。
あちらの装置についてお伺いしても……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001870_VARSHAHN<tab>It was crafted by our alchemists at my behest. For the purpose of...sealing something away.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001870_VARSHAHN<tab>……かつて、私が錬金術師たちに作らせたものだ。
あるものを封印するためにな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Sealing away what, exactly?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何を封印している？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I wasn't going to touch it, but you know Y'shtola...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>自分は止めたのに、ヤ・シュトラが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001880_YSHTOLA<tab>You and I will speak later.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001880_YSHTOLA<tab>あなた……あとで話をしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001890_GRAHATIA<tab>Not the time for frivolity, my friend, not the time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001890_GRAHATIA<tab>おいおい、今は冗談を言っている場合じゃないだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001900_URIANGER<tab>This “something” of which thou speakest... Might it be some manner of threat?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001900_URIANGER<tab>何を封印されているのでしょう……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001910_URIANGER<tab>This “something” of which thou speakest... Might it be some manner of threat?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001910_URIANGER<tab>何を封印されているのでしょう……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001920_VARSHAHN<tab>Perhaps I should simply show you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001920_VARSHAHN<tab>まずは見てもらった方が早いだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001930_VARSHAHN<tab>I have lifted the seal, if only for the moment. By an authority only I possess.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001930_VARSHAHN<tab>私にのみ与えられた権限で、一時的に封印を解いた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001940_URIANGER<tab>A planar fissure!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001940_URIANGER<tab>これは……ヴォイドクラック……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001950_GRAHATIA<tab>No, my friend... Small though it may be, this is a functioning gate into the void!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001950_GRAHATIA<tab>……いや。
小さくともこれは……ヴォイドゲートだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001960_YSHTOLA<tab>I must admit, I am deathly curious to know how a voidgate came to be hidden in the depths of these ruins.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001960_YSHTOLA<tab>詳しく聞かせてもらえないかしら？
なぜ、こんな所にヴォイドゲートが封印されているのかを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001970_VARSHAHN<tab>To tell that tale, we must first peer far to the south, and even further into memory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001970_VARSHAHN<tab>……その理由にふれる前に、
遠く南方での昔話を語っておく必要がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001980_VARSHAHN<tab>An age five millennia past, when the Allagan Empire sent an invading force to the shores of Meracydia.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001980_VARSHAHN<tab>遡ること5000年以上……
アラグ帝国が南方大陸メラシディアに対し、
侵略戦争を仕掛けたときのことだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001990_VARSHAHN<tab>The southern people rallied around the commanding figures of Bahamut and Tiamat, and fought fiercely to repel the would-be conquerors.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001990_VARSHAHN<tab>押し寄せるアラグの軍勢に対し、メラシディアの民は、
二翼の天竜、バハムートとティアマットのもとに集い、
果敢な抵抗を見せていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002000_VARSHAHN<tab>With Bahamut's defeat, however, the tide turned against them. Desperate to seize any advantage, the Meracydians resorted to summoning primal entities.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002000_VARSHAHN<tab>だが、バハムートが討ち取られたことで均衡が崩れる。
そうして劣勢に立たされたメラシディアの民は、
次々に蛮神を召喚したのだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002010_VARSHAHN<tab>In response, Emperor Xande forged a covenant with the Cloud of Darkness, sovereign among the all-devouring denizens of the void.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002010_VARSHAHN<tab>これに対して時の皇帝、ザンデが採ったのが、
ヴォイドの魔王「暗闇の雲」との契約という策だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002020_VARSHAHN<tab>Thus bolstered by eikons on one side and voidsent on the other, the two armies clashed in a battle of unspeakable carnage. So much death. So much loss.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002020_VARSHAHN<tab>蛮神を擁するメラシディアの軍勢と、
魔王配下の妖異を擁するアラグの軍勢の正面衝突……
それは悲惨な戦いだったよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002030_GRAHATIA<tab>I consider myself well versed in that period of history, yet you speak as one who witnessed it happen...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002030_GRAHATIA<tab>オレたちも、そのあたりの歴史については、
詳しいつもりだが……まるで見てきたような口ぶりだな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002040_VARSHAHN<tab>Indeed I did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002040_VARSHAHN<tab>事実、見ていたんだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002050_VARSHAHN<tab>I heard Tiamat's roar of defiance, and sped toward that war-torn land...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002050_VARSHAHN<tab>劣勢に立たされたティアマットの咆哮を聞き、
彼の地へとかけつけた私と……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002060_VARSHAHN<tab>...along with my sibling, Azdaja.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002060_VARSHAHN<tab>「姉」であるアジュダヤはね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002070_VARSHAHN<tab>We dragons are not “male” or “female” as men are wont to classify, but “elder sister” is the closest a mortal tongue can come to describing what she meant to me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002070_VARSHAHN<tab>本来、我ら竜には雄雌の性別はないのだが……
ヒトの言葉で言い表すなら、
アジュダヤは私にとって「姉」と呼ぶべき存在だろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002080_VARSHAHN<tab>I was the last of our brood to hatch, and Azdaja cared for me where my sire could not.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002080_VARSHAHN<tab>もっとも遅く孵った小さな私を、
親代わりのように育ててくれた相手でもあるのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002090_VARSHAHN<tab>Thus I was with her when Tiamat roared. I was with her when she journeyed south. And I was with her when she fought against the voidsent hordes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002090_VARSHAHN<tab>だから、当時も共にあり、
ティアマットの咆哮を聞いて南方に向かい……
その窮地を救わんと、妖異の軍勢と戦ったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002100_VARSHAHN<tab>Yet no matter how many of their vile fiends we cast down, more rose from the abyss to take their place. Faced with an unwinnable war of attrition, Azdaja risked her all on a final gamble...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002100_VARSHAHN<tab>しかし、どれほど討ち倒しても妖異は無数に現れる。
消耗戦を強いられる中で、
やがてアジュダヤは、戦況を変えるべく賭けに出た。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002110_VARSHAHN<tab>She plunged through the voidgate itself to strike at the root of their strength.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002110_VARSHAHN<tab>ヴォイドゲートに突入し、
妖異の軍勢の大本を叩こうとしたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002120_VARSHAHN<tab>I tried to follow in her wake, determined to lend what aid I could...but even as I came upon Allag's glittering tower, I saw the rift close behind her.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002120_VARSHAHN<tab>むろん、私も姉さんを追って、
アラグの根拠地にそびえ立つ水晶の塔に向かったが……
目の前でゲートが閉じてしまってね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002130_VARSHAHN<tab>And Azdaja has been lost to us ever since.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002130_VARSHAHN<tab>それ以来、姉さんの……
アジュダヤの行方はようとして知れない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002140_GRAHATIA<tab>I find I must retract my earlier claim of historical knowledge─nowhere in the Crystal Tower's archives did I see mention of such noble sacrifice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002140_GRAHATIA<tab>歴史に詳しいだなんて前言は、撤回しなくちゃならないな……。
クリスタルタワーの記録にも、そんな話は記載されてなかったぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002150_VARSHAHN<tab>That does not surprise me. To Allagan eyes, it must have seemed as if a lone dragon, driven to madness, simply dove through the gate and did not return.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002150_VARSHAHN<tab>アラグにとっては、取るに足らない出来事だったのだろう。
破れかぶれになった竜が、ヴォイドゲートに飛び込み、
そして帰ってこなかっただけなのだから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002160_VARSHAHN<tab>For my part, I spent long years searching for the means to reunite with Azdaja...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002160_VARSHAHN<tab>ともかく私は、それから長きにわたり、
アジュダヤの痕跡を探し求めた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002170_VARSHAHN<tab>Until I could search no more─until Allag was dust, and the arts to open a voidgate large enough to accommodate a dragon forever lost.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002170_VARSHAHN<tab>だが、アラグの滅亡に伴い、
竜が通過できるほどのゲートを開く技は失われ、
姉さんを追跡する手段もなくなってしまった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002180_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet you have the beginnings of a gate right here, under the control of a Hannish device.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002180_YSHTOLA<tab>でも、現にここにはヴォイドゲートがある。
それもラザハン式錬金術の技法を用いた装置で、
人為的に制御されたものが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002190_VARSHAHN<tab>My discovery came before Radz-at-Han was founded. Though I scoured the lands for a method to cross the rift, it was beneath the sea that I chanced to find a natural planar fissure.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002190_VARSHAHN<tab>ラザハンが興るよりも前のことだ。
アジュダヤ捜索のため、ヴォイドに渡る術を探し求めていた私は、
豊穣海の海底にて、自然に生じたらしい<var 4A ((次元の裂け目)) ((クラック)) /var>を見出した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002200_VARSHAHN<tab>It was, however, far too narrow to admit a wyrm's bulk. Only after our city rose upon the rock, and I could enlist the aid of our talented alchemists, did matters take a favorable turn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002200_VARSHAHN<tab>だが、そのクラックは小さく、竜の巨体では通過が叶わなくてな。
しかしラザハン建国によって錬金術師たちの協力を、
得られるようになったことで事態が動き出した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002210_VARSHAHN<tab>Their dedication was beyond reproach. Tirelessly they worked to expand the fissure, and after decades of toil, it finally grew to a size that a child might pass through...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002210_VARSHAHN<tab>彼らは、本当によくやってくれたよ。
数十年の時を経て、このような「人形」を通すほどにまで、
クラックを拡張してくれたのだから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002220_ESTINIEN<tab>Not long ago, you told us that you called out to your kin; that Azdaja's answer was silence. I suspect the conclusion to your tale is not a joyful one.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002220_ESTINIEN<tab>たしか、以前にお前はこう言っていたな。
天竜たちに咆哮で語りかけたが、アジュダヤは答えなかったと。
つまりそれは……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002230_VARSHAHN<tab>With hope in my heart, I used a simulacrum to cross the threshold...but no─I did not find her.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002230_VARSHAHN<tab>……人形の体を使い、ゲートを通ってヴォイドに赴いたが……
姉さんを見つけることは、叶わなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002240_VARSHAHN<tab>What I found was a host of voidsent, clamoring around the opening they had sensed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002240_VARSHAHN<tab>ヴォイドに足を踏み入れた私が見たのは、
ゲートが開いたことを感知して、押し寄せる妖異たちの姿だけ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002250_VARSHAHN<tab>'Twas but a moment, but enough. I had no choice but to retreat and allow the portal to contract once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002250_VARSHAHN<tab>結局は、すぐにこちらの世界に帰らざるを得なかったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002260_ESTINIEN<tab>The gate was a threat to your people. You had to decide between endangering Radz-at-Han, and abandoning your sister... And you chose the latter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002260_ESTINIEN<tab>そのままでは、ラザハンの民に累が及ぶ可能性が高い。
アジュダヤとヒトを天秤にかけ、後者を選んだというわけか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002270_URIANGER<tab>'Twas not that thy sibling scorned thy call; 'twas that she was trapped beyond a barrier through which neither roar nor dragon may pass. Even now, in the desolate world of the Thirteenth...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002270_URIANGER<tab>アジュダヤは、あなたの咆哮に応えなかったのではなく、
そもそも咆哮が届かない場所に、今もなおいるのですね……。
次元の壁によって隔たれた、第十三世界に……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002280_GRAHATIA<tab>I can scarce imagine your pain, yet it was wise not to linger in that place. Too long a sojourn, and even a being of your power risks being warped into a creature of the void.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002280_GRAHATIA<tab>いずれにせよ、すぐに引き返したのは正解だった。
第十三世界に残り続けていたら、いかに天竜とは言っても、
妖異化してしまう危険性があるからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002290_GRAHATIA<tab>You've seen this phenomenon before, when we stepped into the darkness...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002290_GRAHATIA<tab>あんたも、闇の世界で目にしただろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Aye, I thought our time had come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>あのときは死ぬかと思った

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I remember when Nero turned purple...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ネロさンが紫色のパリパリになったときの……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002300_GRAHATIA<tab>As did I. Were it not for Unei and Doga─or Nero, for that matter─we might never have made it home.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002300_GRAHATIA<tab>ああ、そうだな。
ウネとドーガ、そしてネロがいなければ、
オレたちは帰ってこられなかったかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002310_GRAHATIA<tab>Do you remember what happened to Nero? How his wounds allowed the void's corruption to enter his body and twist his aether?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002310_GRAHATIA<tab>そして、あのときにネロがどうなったか、思い出してくれ。
外傷をきっかけに体内のエーテルが乱れて、
肉体が変容しかけていたろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002320_GRAHATIA<tab>Turn purple? Well, yes, his wounds had allowed the void's corruption to enter his body and twist his aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002320_GRAHATIA<tab>パリパリって……
あのとき、ネロは外傷をきっかけに体内のエーテルが乱れて、
肉体が変容しかけていたんだぞ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002330_GRAHATIA<tab>Remember well what happened to Nero, when his wounds allowed the void's corruption to enter his body and twist his aether...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002330_GRAHATIA<tab>あのときにネロがどうなったか、思い出してくれ。
外傷をきっかけに体内のエーテルが乱れて、
肉体が変容しかけていたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002340_GRAHATIA<tab>Had it been allowed to progress much longer, I presume he would've been fully transformed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002340_GRAHATIA<tab>つまり、あのまま時間が経てば、
生きながらにして妖異へと変じていた可能性が高い。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002350_VARSHAHN<tab>Then there is little hope for Azdaja...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002350_VARSHAHN<tab>だとしたら、姉さんはすでに……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002360_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, no, I hadn't meant to─ I speak only of possibilities.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002360_GRAHATIA<tab>ああ、いや、すまない。
あくまで可能性の話をしただけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002370_GRAHATIA<tab>The scales of the first brood are extraordinarily resistant to aetherial fluctuations. They are the protective talismans' core components, after all, and even the corruption I described would struggle to overcome─
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002370_GRAHATIA<tab>七大天竜の鱗は、エーテルの変化にめっぽう強いはずだ。
護魂の霊鱗の素材としても使われたぐらいだし、
そう簡単に妖異化することは……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002380_GRAHATIA<tab>Of course. With a warding scale in one's possession, one could conceivably survive a stay in the Thirteenth without being warped by its energies...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002380_GRAHATIA<tab>って、そうか……
霊鱗があれば、第十三世界に長期間滞在したとしても、
妖異化することなく行動できるかもしれないな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002390_VARSHAHN<tab>Be that as it may, it is too late to rescue my sister. Five thousand years too late.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002390_VARSHAHN<tab>いずれにせよ、終わったことだ。
姉さんがあの暗がりに消えたのは、
5000年以上も前のこと……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002400_VARSHAHN<tab>And now, countless others look to me for guidance and protection.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002400_VARSHAHN<tab>……なにより、今の私には、護らねばならない民がいる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002410_VARSHAHN<tab>So when I sensed intruders in the ruins, I came only to ensure that the gate remain closed. That, and to secure the treasure, of course.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002410_VARSHAHN<tab>そも私は、遺跡に入り込んだ者を感知し、
いたずらにゲートを開くことがなきよう、ここに来たのだ。
宝の回収も兼ねてな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002420_VARSHAHN<tab>I wish only to forget the rest...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002420_VARSHAHN<tab>いっそ忘れてしまえたら、どれだけ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002430_VRITRA<tab>I thank you for your attendance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002430_VRITRA<tab>皆、集まってくれて感謝する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002440_VRITRA<tab>The riches the Radiant Host have retrieved were hoarded in Alzadaal's name─a fortune I set aside for a future day of need.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002440_VRITRA<tab>先ほど、星戦士団に運んでもらった金銀財宝は、
アルザダールの名を借りて、私が有事に備えて蓄えてきたものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002450_VRITRA<tab>And lo, that day hath come. May it aid our wounded city in reclaiming its vibrancy and vigor!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002450_VRITRA<tab>それを投じるべきは、今を置いてほかにあるまい。
終末により傷ついた多彩なる都に、彩りを取り戻すために……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002460_VRITRA<tab>In better times, I would leave such a task to our capable Ahewann, gods rest his soul.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002460_VRITRA<tab>常ならば、このようなとき、
私は太守たちに頼り、その仕事にまかせてきた。
だが、アヒワーン亡き今、彼の手腕に頼ることはできない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002470_VRITRA<tab>Finding myself bereft of his counsel in the here and now, I will assume the responsibilities of mine office directly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002470_VRITRA<tab>よって、いまここに私が太守として指針を示す！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002480_VRITRA<tab>Firstly, the treasure shall be sold for more convenient currency, thence invested into the trading port of Yedlihmad. Our merchants must have their operations restored, their ships rebuilt. Commerce must flow once more!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002480_VRITRA<tab>まず、宝物殿より運び出した財宝の換金を進め、
これを財源として、イェドリマンの交易商に出資すべし！
人手と船を失った商人を助け、交易の活性化を促すのだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002490_VRITRA<tab>None were spared the tragedy of the Final Days─of this I am well aware.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002490_VRITRA<tab>むろん、あれほどの惨劇を経験したのだ。
誰もが支援を必要としていることは重々承知している。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002500_VRITRA<tab>But an absence was created by the loss of Khalzahl's consortium, and by filling it, we provide new means for our fishermen, our artisans, and others to bring their wares to distant markets.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002500_VRITRA<tab>だが、交易商への支援は、
カルザール商会という大きな卸先を失った、
漁師や職人、石工たちを救うことにも繋がると信じている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002510_ESTINIEN<tab>And what of the children who were left without family to care for them?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002510_ESTINIEN<tab>終末で親を失った子どもたちへの対応は、
どうするつもりだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002520_VRITRA<tab>That is a concern which weigheth heavily upon my mind. A simple gift of coin will soon be exhausted, leaving these young souls adrift on the fringes of our society.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002520_VRITRA<tab>その点は、私も懸念するところだ。
ただ単に金を施すだけでは、いずれ資金は枯渇し、
孤児たちがふたたび路頭に迷うことになってしまう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002530_VRITRA<tab>Nay, a proper solution is needed, one which doth guarantee their welfare for years to come.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002530_VRITRA<tab>子どもたちを恒久的に保護していくための、
新たな施策を考えなければならないと思っている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002540_VRITRA<tab>Thou hast surely seen how other nations rise to meet this challenge, adventurer. What dost thou deem the wisest course?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002540_VRITRA<tab>そこで、冒険者として数多くの国を見てきた、
君の意見を聞きたいのだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Taxes. Levy them on trade profits in exchange for your investment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>貿易商を支援する代わりに、売上金の一部を徴収しよう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It takes a village...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>助け合いの精神で……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Idyllshire's orphanage was funded through trade in highly coveted goods...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>イディルシャイアの孤児院を参考にしよう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Firmament's orphanage was built as part of a communal restoration effort.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>蒼天街の孤児院を参考にしよう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002550_VRITRA<tab>I see... We create a reliable source of revenue.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002550_VRITRA<tab>なるほど……それは名案だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002560_VRITRA<tab>Of course... We must all look out for one another.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002560_VRITRA<tab>救われた者が、別の誰かを救う……そうか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002570_VRITRA<tab>Of course... We can draw on trading profits to build a new institution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002570_VRITRA<tab>「ロウェナ商会」が資金を捻出し、孤児院を……そうか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002580_VRITRA<tab>Of course... The revival of trade can contribute to the building of a new institution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002580_VRITRA<tab>復興事業の一環として孤児院を……そうか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002590_VRITRA<tab>Let us put this idea into practice. A contract shall be written, requiring all who receive of Alzadaal's treasure to commit a portion of their future earnings towards the running of an orphanage.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002590_VRITRA<tab>素晴らしいアイディアだ。
出資の条件として、商人たちに売上の一部を、
孤児院運営に拠出するよう契約を結ぶとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002600_VRITRA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002600_VRITRA<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002610_VRITRA<tab>Now, such an influential policy is deserving of a worthy name...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002610_VRITRA<tab>さて、そうとなればこの制度にも、名をつけたいところだが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Something with “Khalzahl” seems appropriate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>カルザールの名を借りよう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why not honor one of your most successful merchants?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>偉大な交易商の名を借りよう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002620_VRITRA<tab>Ah, a fitting candidate...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002620_VRITRA<tab>カルザール……。
なるほど、そういうことか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002630_VRITRA<tab>A successful merchant...? Ah, I believe I see thy reasoning.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002630_VRITRA<tab>偉大な交易商……？
なるほど、カルザールのことか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002640_VRITRA<tab>Khalzahl should be remembered not as the blasphemy which terrorized Thavnair, but as a hardworking and generous man who brought much wealth to our shores.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002640_VRITRA<tab>サベネア島を恐怖に陥れた偽神獣としてではなく、
ラザハンの偉大な交易商として、彼の名を遺そうというのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002650_VRITRA<tab>Do any among you object to this proposition? Many here lost loved ones to the beasts...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002650_VRITRA<tab>異論などあるはずもない……。
しかし、この中にも獣に家族を奪われた者は多い。
皆の意見も聞かせてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002660_NAHBDEEN<tab>In that time of strife, any one of us could have broken. Any one of us may have been taken by despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002660_NAHBDEEN<tab>あのときは多かれ少なかれ、みんなが動揺していた。
誰もが獣になる可能性があったんです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002670_NAHBDEEN<tab>When I think of Khalzahl, I feel no hatred...only a stinging regret that we could not save him as well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002670_NAHBDEEN<tab>カルザールさんを救えなかった悔しさはあれど、
恨んでなんかいませんよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002680_NAHBDEEN<tab>Isn't that right, men!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002680_NAHBDEEN<tab>みんなだってそうだろ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002690_ESTINIEN<tab>This bodes well for that boy─“Mehrahd,” was it? Perhaps he can cut ties with that shady peddler.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002690_ESTINIEN<tab>あのガキ、メラドとか言ったか。
これで、あこぎな商売から足を洗えるかもな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002700_VRITRA<tab>Then let it be done. Henceforth, this initiative shall be known as the “Khalzahl Foundation”!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002700_VRITRA<tab>では、ここに「カルザール基金」の立ち上げを宣言する！
善は急げだ、すぐさま取り掛かるとしよう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002710_VRITRA<tab>Nahbdeen, thou art to assemble a patrol, and ensure that no child in this city liveth in squalor!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002710_VRITRA<tab>ナブディーンは隊を編制し、
孤児たちを保護するべく巡回へ向かってくれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002720_VRITRA<tab>Clerks! See to the management of our funds and make haste! Our citizens must not suffer a day more than is necessary!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002720_VRITRA<tab>君たちは、直ちに基金の運用を開始してくれ！
一刻も早く、困窮した民を救うのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002730_ESTINIEN<tab>Dragon and man, side by side in pursuit of a brighter morrow. I'm reminded of Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002730_ESTINIEN<tab>竜と人が手を取り合って、立ち上がろうとしている……
思い出すな、イシュガルドを。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002740_YSHTOLA<tab>Right─here we all are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002740_YSHTOLA<tab>来てくれたのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002750_ESTINIEN<tab>You discovered something new?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002750_ESTINIEN<tab>それで、何かわかったのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002760_YSHTOLA<tab>I took a closer look at that device. I was able to determine how it keeps the voidgate sealed, but not how it might instead be employed to expand the opening.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002760_YSHTOLA<tab>あの制御装置を調べた結果、
ヴォイドゲートを「封印」する機能は見つかったものの、
「拡張」する機能は確認できなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002770_YSHTOLA<tab>For that, I would need to reference the technique developed by Vrtra's alchemists─no records of which appear to have survived the intervening years.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002770_YSHTOLA<tab>ヴリトラの言葉どおり、ゲートを広げるためには、
かつて錬金術師たちが用いた方法について調べる必要があるわ。
もっとも、その技術はすでに失われているとのことだけれど。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002780_ESTINIEN<tab>We know this, so why have you sent for us? Have you learned aught of value or not?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002780_ESTINIEN<tab>そんなわかりきったことを説明するために、
俺たちを呼んだわけじゃないだろう。
世界を渡る方法とやらの手がかりは見つかったのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002790_YSHTOLA<tab>Patience, good ser─one must introduce the subject before launching into specifics.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002790_YSHTOLA<tab>それを今から説明させてもらうわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002800_YSHTOLA<tab>From what we understand, travel between worlds is accomplished by passing through the nebulous rift which exists between them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002800_YSHTOLA<tab>……まず前提として、
世界を飛び越えるには、次元の狭間を通る必要があるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002810_YSHTOLA<tab>Picture, if you will, the moment you were called to the First.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002810_YSHTOLA<tab>あなたが第一世界へと、
喚ばれたときのことを思い出して頂戴。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002820_YSHTOLA<tab>You touched a focus of some kind to help the Exarch pinpoint your location. His summoning spell then channeled the energies of the Crystal Tower to begin your journey to his world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002820_YSHTOLA<tab>第一世界側にいた召喚者、つまり水晶公が、
クリスタルタワーの機能を利用した召喚術を展開した。
あのとき、あなたは目印となる装置に触れたはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002830_YSHTOLA<tab>The magicks tore a hole in the wall separating Source and shard, and cast you into the intervening nothingness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002830_YSHTOLA<tab>これによって、世界を隔てる壁に穴が開けられ、
あなたは次元の狭間に堕ちた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002840_YSHTOLA<tab>In that place, the laws of nature hold no sway...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002840_YSHTOLA<tab>そこは、どの世界にも属していない、
まさしく「狭間」と呼ぶにふさわしい空間……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002850_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet even through this realm of temporal and spatial instability, you were borne safely to your destination in the First.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002850_YSHTOLA<tab>その後、召喚術に引き寄せられる形で、
あなたは狭間を脱して第一世界側に出ることができた、
というわけね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002860_YSHTOLA<tab>The feat that guided you across such an unimaginable distance─both physical and metaphorical─was nothing short of a miracle.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002860_YSHTOLA<tab>あらゆる時間と空間がもつれた次元の狭間を、
原初世界から第一世界まで、正確に誘導してみせた……。
まさに奇跡にも等しい所業よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002870_ESTINIEN<tab>Then what of the many voidsent found in the Source? Who guides them here, and how?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002870_ESTINIEN<tab>なら、原初世界へやってくる妖異どもは、
誰がどうやって誘導しているっていうんだ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>An excellent question.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>あら、いい着眼点ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>Though there are several methods by which the void's denizens might intrude upon our world, the rituals of summoning are the most typical.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>妖異がこちら側へ来る方法は、いくつかあるのだけれど……
その代表例といえば、やはり「妖異召喚」でしょうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>For example, let us consider the gargoyle─a creature of middling power.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>そうね、ガーゴイルと呼ばれる中位の妖異を例に、
説明してみましょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002910_YSHTOLA<tab>To call upon such an entity, the prospective summoner must force open a voidgate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002910_YSHTOLA<tab>まず、妖異を呼び寄せたいと願う召喚者が、
召喚術によって、小さなヴォイドゲートを瞬間的に開くの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>The portal lasts but a moment and is relatively small, allowing only an imp or other lesser being to squeeze through with their physical body intact.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>その際、インプのような力を持たない低位の妖異なら、
肉体を維持したままゲートを通り、原初世界へ渡ってこられるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>Our more powerful gargoyle, however, is too large for that. Creating a gate big enough for him would require vast amounts of energy─far beyond the reserves of any one mortal practitioner.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>でも、より力のある中位以上の妖異になると、そうはいかない。
召喚者ひとりでは賄いきれないような莫大な力を注いで、
大きなゲートを開く必要がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002940_YSHTOLA<tab>Instead, 'tis far more common to bring over only the entity's soul. We had a taste of that ourselves when a certain Exarch dragged us to the First.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002940_YSHTOLA<tab>だから、「妖異召喚」では魂だけをこちら側に呼び寄せるの。
私たちが誰かさんに、第一世界へと喚ばれたときのようにね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>And just as our bodies remained in our world, the voidsent's physical form is left behind in the Thirteenth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>当然、召喚された妖異の肉体は、第十三世界に残ることになるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002960_YSHTOLA<tab>Once at its destination, the summoned soul is granted a temporary shell to inhabit. In the gargoyle's case, a stone effigy has proven a suitable vessel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002960_YSHTOLA<tab>そして、引き寄せられた妖異の魂には、
原初世界で活動するための仮初の肉体が与えられる……。
それが依り代であり、ガーゴイルの場合は石が最適とされている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002970_ESTINIEN<tab>Wait─you said that voidsent must be called here deliberately by someone in the Source─reeled in like a fisherman with his catch?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002970_ESTINIEN<tab>なるほどな。
つまり「妖異召喚」の場合は、
原初世界側の召喚者という明確な誘導役がいるということか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>Exactly. For a being to navigate the chaos of the rift, with or without form, there must needs be a guiding agent on the other side.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>ええ。
安全に、そして確実に肉体を保持したまま次元跳躍をするには、
何らかの誘導役が必要だと、理解してもらえたかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002990_VARSHAHN<tab>When the hordes poured forth from Allag's great gate, it was the technologists who drew them through.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002990_VARSHAHN<tab>私たちが戦った妖異の軍勢も、
アラグ帝国によって開かれたゲートを通って現れた。
アラグの魔科学者たちが、誘導役を務めたということだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003000_VARSHAHN<tab>Though to my knowledge, planar fissures are, in essence, natural passages between our world and the void, which require no such guidance to traverse.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003000_VARSHAHN<tab>だが、ヴォイドクラックのように自然発生した裂け目には、
そのような確たる誘導役は存在していないはずだ。
だというのに、正しく世界が繋がっている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003010_VARSHAHN<tab>Why is only the boundary between the Source and the Thirteenth so fragile? So much so that it often tears open of its own accord...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003010_VARSHAHN<tab>そもそも、なぜ第十三世界とだけ、
自然に裂け目が通じるくらい、簡単に世界が繋がるのだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003020_YSHTOLA<tab>I believe solving that mystery is key to understanding travel between the Source and its reflections.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003020_YSHTOLA<tab>その謎を解き明かすことができれば、
世界を自在に飛び越えるための糸口となるはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003030_ESTINIEN<tab>And how do you intend to get your answers?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003030_ESTINIEN<tab>ほう。
だがどうやって、その「謎」とやらを調べるつもりなんだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003040_VARSHAHN<tab>...No, the danger is too great!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003040_VARSHAHN<tab>…………まさか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003050_YSHTOLA<tab>Perhaps. But what some call “danger,” others think of as “adventure.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003050_YSHTOLA<tab>ええ、そのまさかよ。
まさに新たなる冒険、とでも言うのかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003060_VARSHAHN<tab>Were you not listening to my tale? Never mind that the means to expand the gate has been lost to the ages.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003060_VARSHAHN<tab>私の話を聞いていたのか？
人が通れるほどにゲートを拡張するすべは、すでに失われているのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003070_VARSHAHN<tab>Even could you force the portal wide enough, you would be greeted by an army of murderous horrors the very instant you stepped through.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003070_VARSHAHN<tab>さらに、それができたとて、
第十三世界へ一歩足を踏み入れた途端、
妖異の大群に襲われる羽目になるんだぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003080_YSHTOLA<tab>I assure you I was most attentive. And I agree that to go alone would be certain death.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003080_YSHTOLA<tab>もちろん、聞いていたわよ。
当然、私ひとりでは無理でしょうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>But if I were to bring along one who has already braved the Thirteenth and humbled the Cloud of Darkness─well, I imagine my chances would be much improved.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>でも……第十三世界へ渡り、
暗闇の雲を撃退した経験のある、あなたと一緒なら……
不可能ではないはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Count me in.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>付き合おう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>So much for taking it easy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>また忙しくなるな

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>I had a feeling you might say that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>ありがとう。
あなたならそう言ってくれると思っていたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003110_YSHTOLA<tab>Once again, I put my life in your ever-reliable hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003110_YSHTOLA<tab>お言葉に甘えて、また頼りにさせてもらうわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003120_YSHTOLA<tab>Since when were you one for the quiet life?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003120_YSHTOLA<tab>あら……退屈を好むあなたじゃないでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003130_YSHTOLA<tab>Once again, I put my life in your ever-reliable hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003130_YSHTOLA<tab>また頼りにさせてもらうわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003140_YSHTOLA<tab>That said, as much as I would like to march straight back to the voidgate, there is the small matter of being unable to open it without the satrap's personal authority...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003140_YSHTOLA<tab>さて、すぐにでも第十三世界へ向かいたいところだけれど、
豊穣海のゲートは、ラザハンが長年保守、管理してきたもの。
太守様の許可なしに、開けることはできないわね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003150_VARSHAHN<tab>As I've said before, I will grant you and yours any boon you choose to name...provided it does not endanger my people.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003150_VARSHAHN<tab>先ほども言ったように、
恩人である君たちの願いは、可能な限り叶えたい。
……ラザハンの子らに累が及ぶことがなければな。
